George and Juliette are on holiday. She behaves outrageously - walking up the steps of the hotel in her undies (after the first example of a running slapstick gag where her dress gets caught in the car door), exposing her breasts to the waiter and blowing him a kiss. Brigitte Verbecq, George's wife, is a lawyer and we first see her in her gown of office sitting at her desk being pleasured by Gil, a criminal, presumably a client. Then she turns up at the hotel - and her dress gets caught in the lift door. The waiter is turned on by what he sees at the hotel and has sex with the maid and every woman - Brigitte, the maid, a guest (Pascale Vital) seems to throw herself at Alban, except Dominique.
